Returns: the StreetViewPanorama. Null if the view is not yet ready. This can happen when Google Play services is not available. If Google Play services becomes available afterwards, calling this method again will initialize and return the panorama.
getStreetViewPanorama().Description: Gets the underlying StreetViewPanorama that is tied to this view.

Parameters: The callback object that will be triggered when the panorama is ready to be used.
getStreetViewPanoramaAsync(com.google.an.Description: Sets a callback object which will be triggered when the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanorama_E@ instance is ready to be used. Note that: In the case where Google Play services is not installed on the user's device, the callback will not be triggered until the user installs it. The callback will be executed in the main thread. The @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanorama_E@ object provided by the callback is non-null.

ClassDesc: A View which displays a Street View panorama (with data obtained from the Google Maps service). When focused, it will capture keypresses and touch gestures to move the panorama. Users of this class must forward all the life cycle methods from the @B_android#app#Activity_E@ or @B_android#app#Fragment_E@ containing this view to the corresponding ones in this class. In particular, you must forward the following methods: @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#onCreate_E@ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#onResume_E@ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#onPause_E@ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#onDestroy_E@ @B_android#view#View#onSaveInstanceState_E@ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#onLowMemory_E@ A @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanorama_E@ must be acquired using @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView#getStreetViewPanoramaAsync_E@. The @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView_E@ automatically initializes the Street View system and the view. For a simpler method of displaying a StreetViewPanorama use @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaFragment_E@ (or @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#SupportStreetViewPanoramaFragment_E@) if you are looking to target earlier platforms. Note: You are advised not to add children to this view.
